# PED::SET_PED_COWER_HASH

## Summary
Override the ped's default cowering hash

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **STRING** cowerScenarioName: Can currently be either CODE_HUMAN_STAND_COWER or CODE_HUMAN_COWER.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p1: Only "CODE_HUMAN_STAND_COWER" found in the b617d scripts.
